===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# [[train]] {{zh-mw|m:列|c:架|m:節|m,c:班|m:趟}}
#: {{zh-x|我 坐 火車 去 ^上海。|I am going to Shanghai by '''train'''.}}

====Usage notes====
* {{lang|zh|火車／火车}} refers to the train itself and to the mode of transportation. So it is used in terms related to the railway. {{zh-l|列車}} is sometimes used instead to follow technology development as trains are not steam powered anymore. But it only refers to the train itself and can't replace {{lang|zh|火車／火车}} in the previous term.
